Posts.Content: Feb 7, 2017 05:45PM Whistlestop wrote: Good afternoon ladies..... I am following your thread/posts, as I am scheduled 3/9/17 for Rt. MX with spacer. Still digesting the next phase re: reconstruction w/ BMX of left ....and whether DIEP or not. Plastic Surgeon noted I have enough in my post menopausal tummy pooch for 2 nice "C" cups. So I guess that 's one way to be thankful for that addition. Still deciding, based on recovery and down time..... Can anyone weigh in on reconstruction with DIEP ? In midst of all the pre-surgery stuff....stress tests, cardiac clearance etc. Never been to some many DR appts. , guess I am making up for all the full vitality years. Appreciate the input...... BTW here's a little something that popped into my email today.....you might enjoy it. It's a piece from Ralph Marston @ greatday.com http://greatday.com/cgi-bin/X10/video.pl?mc17020709HQc6x  Terry ( aka Whistlestop)
